title: The Manual: 4 best night-time products and brow essentials to buy now, according to The Telegraph's grooming expert
text:
On the hunt for a new men's grooming essential? Every fortnight, our grooming expert, Lee Kynaston, will be rounding up the best products that have earned his seal of approval.

From the best night-time products to brow essentials, these are the 8 products to invest in now.

Bring on the night-time routine

Thanks to the morning shave, men’s daily grooming regime has long been centred around the start of the day. In truth though, night-time is where the focus of your skincare routine should lie, because it’s while you’re busy dreaming of Champions League success, dinner with Kylie or, in my case, Walkers Sweet Chilli Sensations, that skin switches to repair mode and is most receptive to the stuff...
